metadata.description: Saya is the head mechanic on the mercenary space carrier Manticore. But she was once a savvy street kid working in a chop shop, and her past life comes calling, drawing her back into that criminal world. On Neo Vegas station, she befriends Nara, a young gear head who's in over her head, and Saya wants to help her get out alive. Of course, once pirates show up, everyone is in over their heads and none of them may be getting out alive. In this tie-in story to app game Galaxy on Fire 3 – Manticore, the glowing embers of the past might just ignite a deadly blast.
metadata.name: Galaxy on Fire III: Manticore
